content:
Title: Data Analyst

Department: Sales


Description:

As a Data Analyst in Sales, you will analyze and interpret sales data to provide insights that drive revenue growth...


Responsibilities:

1. Collect, clean, and analyze sales data from various sources. 2. Develop and maintain reports, dashboards, and visualizations for sales performance tracking...


Qualifications:

Bachelor’s degree in Data Science, Statistics, or a related field, with 2+ years of experience in data analysis...
